document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Citations:
Samin & Sakenin ( 2014 )
cited the species from Nowshahr (Prov. of Mazandaran) but this record is dubious as in last Palearctic catalogue (
Löbl & Smetana, 2003
).
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Shiraz, 2010 (Prov. of Fars ), Baladeh, 2010 (Prov. of Mazandaran), Jamal Abad (Prov. of Qazvin) and Quemsar, 2012 (Prov. of Esfahan).

Studied material: Kermanshah C. 2014 (Prov. of Kermanshah); ( ZMTU ): Karaj, Uni of Agriculture and Baraghan, River (Prov. of Elburz), Kolyak; 40km S Tavir; Kolijak and Firooz Kola (Prov. of Mazandaran), Ghole, Sabz, NW Shahr-e Kord, 2240 m (Prov. of Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari).

bibRefCitation.author: Tschitscherine
bibRefCitation.refString: Tschitscherine, T. (1901) Note sur deux especes du genre Abacetus Dej. decouvertes en Perse par M. N. Zarudny (Coleoptera, Carabidae). Russkoe entomologicheskoe obozrenie, 1 (3), 88 - 89.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ophonus ( Macrophonus ) oblongus (Schaum, 1858 ) Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kataev & Wrase, 2003
).
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Takir; 15 km east of Baladeh, Valashid and 10 km West of Pol-e Sefid, 870 m (Prov. of Mazandaran).
Citations: Damavand Mt. Gosfand Sara (Prov. of Tehran; Morvan, 1981 ); Takir and 15 km east of Baladeh, 5 km West of Mesen, 10 km West of Pol-e Sefid (Prov. of Mazandaran; Morvan, 1981 ).

Ophonus ( Metophonus ) hittita Sciaky, 1987 Citations
: Province Hamadan (
Wrase, 2005
).
= abalisensis (Morvan, 1977 )
Citations: Ab-Ali Village, 2800 m (Prov. of Tehran; Morvan, 1977 ); Shahrak, 1800 m (Prov. of Gazvin; Morvan, 1977 ); Elburz Mts. R (Morvan, 1977 ).

Ophonus ( Metophonus ) veluchianus (J.Müller, 1931 ) Citations
: Province West Azarbaijan (
Wrase, 2005
).
